data.app_name: Goal Poacher VR: Football Header Simulator (Soccer)
data.description:
(CURRENTLY EARLY ACCESS) 

Become a pro striker who scores headers from corner kicks and free-kicks in a football simulator.

# REAL-LIFE GOAL SCORING SCENARIO
We put together over 50 levels inspired by real-life goals that will test your header skills. 
{502323015590182}
![{"height":935,"type":"image","width":1671}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/227815876_1586323768814851_5411115242033859788_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UQ066g8Z4vYQ7kNvgHGNVxI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDHNFaxgKL7BGa-KyG9NRcxwHa31mAop1Bg8gxlNR55vQ&oe=66B34420)

# CHALLENGING DEFENDERS AI

![{"height":787,"type":"image","width":1400}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75245816_761851356111897_3850337963444926132_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7fvGhY3CAzUQ7kNvgGUYr3D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBfEadzLAxrowFfpBw4aPZiz3VECpj3ic9_oJH4oOeCBw&oe=66B3605B)
The defenders and goalkeepers in this game will try their best to stop you from scoring. You have to quickly assert their positions and decide where to put the ball to maximize scoring chance (as in real life).

# REALISTIC BALL HEADING PHYSICS
We developed our projectile physics to correctly simulate the ball projectile with drag, Magnus effect, and collision check with your head to ensure a realistic heading experience.

![{"height":774,"type":"image","width":1401}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982517_384127807502181_3051717530171403133_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s50eORKdECoQ7kNvgG27y4U&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCnZ0UcF9cty5IH0PyFK5L9iUQQcls5DUvSqZdt3iXceQ&oe=66B34B94)

# NEVER PLAYED FOOTBALL IRL? WE GOT YOU COVERED!

We have slow-motion options so heading becomes easy for new players! We have also prepared a tutorial section to teach you the technique in our training facility!

![{"height":810,"type":"image","width":1440}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982576_2259209321089485_8233948434418091561_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GHmP6q_1MkYQ7kNvgFGF5de&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA-TN6UacNCHtflaf7G7adOKFov_CQs0ZVTTbziLo46fA&oe=66B3457A)


# REALISTIC GOAL-NET PHYSICS

![{"height":976,"type":"image","width":1856}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035338_3587114331599169_835525116529152714_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=drnrhiRtWrgQ7kNvgFbGpux&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmBqBpud5pQqKhtuHUI3PQJt0GET3oUxHzsbdWDOBpZg&oe=66B35754)



The game is in Early Access and we would love to hear your feedback! Join us on Discord now https://discord.gg/Xyp2SyyKXv

changelog.change_log: Hot fix bug can't connect to server

Reduce stuttering during gameplay
Reduce shader + model complexity
Add SFX + haptic to UI
Add skip mandatory handlift at starting level
Other minor bug fixes
